review: I definetly recommend this game. There is multiple ways to play this game including stealth, or all-out rage. You can have a select number of supernatural abilities to help you throughout the game. This game is a great game to play and I would recommend this to any type of gamer. Definetly worth the money!

review: This game... This is a great game. Honestly, never been terrified by a game as much as I was towards this one. They did a great job on everything in this game. I definitely recommend this game to anyone who is down to get terrified.
